install.description: A Kenwood double DIN CD/DVD receiver was molded into the factory GM dash with the help of some plastic surgery.
Folding down the rear seats shows of the JL Audio amps. A 500/4 powers the MB Quart Premium speakers in the doors while the 1000/1 powers the subs.
A lot of black suede accents where integrated into the interior so we decided to continue the theme into the cargo area. The Sub box sports three JL Audio 10W6V2 subwoofers.
A clear #35 was made out of ½" Plexiglas and acts as protection for the subs. The edges where frosted to absorb the neon light for a cool effect.
In the middle of the carpeted floor an acrylic Patriots logo was inserted.
A matching Sound in Motion logo was inserted as well.
Some custom electric blue Neon makes for a cool visual impact.
